page.title: 12Housing Near Stoke Compared
page.content:
UPPER STOKE:In Upper Stoke there are semi_detached ,detached houses and bungalows that are privately owned. They all have large drives,spacious gardens with detached garages.The area is calm and peaceful,and more houses are being built.The houses have names instead of numbers and many have caravans.
FRAMINGHAM EARL:In Framingham Earl there are modern houses and bungalows. The houses are numbered and some have garages.The area is quiet and not so wealthy as Upper Stoke.There is just one bus stop in Framingham Earl.
PORINGLAND:In Poringland there are detached bungalows with small gardens. There is a council estate just off the main road.
